data.name: 票者！小慧的打工大作戰
data.detailed_description:
LATEST RELEASE

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1449300
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1455530
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1477770


About the Game

The game is introduced


Without knowing it, Xiaohui became a voter who decided the direction of the world. Every time an era passed, the world would choose its own voter. The good and evil of the voter would decide the shape of the next era. At the same time, it also decided the ruler of the next era. In order to win the ruling power of the next era, it could not directly influence Xiaohui, The upper bound and the lower bound can only send people to exert influence on the people around Xiaohui, hoping to decide to guide the result of the final election. Under the influence of the lower bound, her father died of serious illness and owed a huge amount of debt during this period. Xiaohui can only resist the burden of her family and choose to work in various shops to solve her debt and livelihood problems, Or do you choose another way to solve the debt problem? In this process, the final tendency of voting is slowly changing. Can Xiaohui pay off the debt in the end? It's up to you to decide where the world will go, whether to create a happy ending or lead the world to chaos.

Game play


In the game, you need to accumulate money through a variety of work events to ensure that you can repay the debt within the specified time. The choice of work content and the amount of money will affect the final outcome.

The game elements


Daily report to RPG
Multiple endings
Multiple choice branching
Time management
Modern background

data.short_description: Xiaohui became a ticket maker who decided the world trend without knowing. In order to win the ruling power of the next era, both the upper and lower circles sent people to influence the people around Xiaohui, hoping to decide to guide the final vote result.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
